InstructionData.Title: Batch Filtration
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias Analyzer d0
alias ratio r0 alias pressure r1 alias pp r2 alias temp1 r10
define MINPRES 100 define FILTER HASH("StructureFiltration") define O2FILTER HASH("O2 Filter") define N2FILTER HASH("N2 Filter") define CO2FILTER HASH("CO2 Filter")
loop: l pressure Analyzer Pressure
l ratio Analyzer RatioOxygen mul pp ratio pressure s db Setting pp sgt temp1 pp MINPRES sbn FILTER O2FILTER On temp1
l ratio Analyzer RatioNitrogen mul pp ratio pressure sgt temp1 pp MINPRES sbn FILTER N2FILTER On temp1
l ratio Analyzer RatioCarbonDioxide mul pp ratio pressure sgt temp1 pp MINPRES sbn FILTER CO2FILTER On temp1
yield j loop
